setup: 1. Copy this file to your GitHub Copilot MCP configuration directory
2. Set GITHUB_TOKEN environment variable with a personal access token
3. For browser automation, run: npx playwright install
4. Add .mcp-memory/ to .gitignore to keep memory data local
5. Restart your IDE/editor after configuration changes

environment_variables.GITHUB_TOKEN: Required for GitHub MCP. Create at: https://github.com/settings/tokens

optional: web-search - Enable if you have API key
